alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Lincoln; Moore (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 01 at 10:34PM CST until March 01 at 11:00PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Madison County in north central Alabama... Southern Moore County in Middle Tennessee... Southeastern Lincoln County in Middle Tennessee... Southwestern Franklin County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 1100 PM CST. * At 1034 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hazel Green, or 7 miles northeast of Meridianville, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Huntland, Lincoln, Smithland, Plevna, Flintville, Elora, Crystal Springs and Hurdlow. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for north central and northeastern Alabama...and Middle Tennessee.
